content: ध्वजवत् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Adorned with flags. {@--2@} Having a mark. {@--3@} Having the mark of a criminal, branded. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A standard-bearer. {@--2@} A vendor of spirituous liquors, distiller. {@--3@} A Brāhmaṇa who carries with him the skull of the man murdered by him to places of pilgrimage by way of penance.
